casebody.data:
IN RE RAYMOND L. FRICK TRUST. Edward M. Kress and Jenny Frick Trychel, a/k/a Jeni Frick Trychel, Successor Co-Trustees, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Bradley Spice and BCL 75, Inc., Defendants-Appellants. SC: 158984
COA: 341498 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 28, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 11, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
